name: Desmond Soon
description: i am seeking for a genuine an honest, truthful, responsible, God fearing woman. A woman whose heart is after God. love’s,a woman that love the Lord with all of her heart. Fit in every area of her life,… A good listener, matured, smart and confident. Above all she must be a believer, Age and distance do not matter’s in God’s love relationship, what really matter is the true love because i believe that love is the greatest commandment in the bible, and i also believe that love will find its partner where ever it can be because love is very powerful and strong.. in Jesus name. i will fine her AMEN..
